H3.text: what state is the steelers from. Pittsburgh

A4.text: The Pittsburgh Steelers are a professional American football team based in Pittsburgh.

A5.text: They currently play their home games at Acrisure Stadium on Pittsburgh's North Side in the North Shore neighborhood, which also hosts the University of Pittsburgh Panthers.
